title: Big Love… May
summary: Big Love… May might be just the main course you are searching for. For $7.78 per serving, this recipe covers 58% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 1 servings with 2164 calories, 89g of protein, and 104g of fat each. 113 people were impressed by this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. Head to the store and pick up google, olive oil, related, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the strawberry pie filling you could follow this main course with the Easy Strawberry Rhubarb Crumble as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 97%. This score is spectacular. Similar recipes are Big and Fluffy Baked Buttermilk Pancakes, Love Week: We Love…graham Sweet Potato Cupcakes, and Love Tea.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375F (190C).Press the dough evenly onto bottom and up sides of the tart pan. Trim dough flush with edge of pan. Prick bottom with a fork to prevent it from bubbling as it bakes.Making the filling Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.Add garlic and cook until lightly browned; add mushrooms and rosemary. Cook until it is brightly colored, about 5 minutes. Whisk coconut milk, eggs, nutmeg, salt and pepper in a small bowl until well mixed. Place mushrooms, sun-dried tomatoes and sheep feta cheese on the tart. Pour coconut and egg mixture over the tart pans. Place on medium rack and bake for about 35-40 minutes.Photos: Johanna FrenkelShareEmailPinterestFacebookTwitterGooglePrintRelated

steps.step: Preheat oven to 375F (190C).Press the dough evenly onto bottom and up sides of the tart pan. Trim dough flush with edge of pan. Prick bottom with a fork to prevent it from bubbling as it bakes.Making the filling
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until lightly browned; add mushrooms and rosemary. Cook until it is brightly colored, about 5 minutes.
Whisk coconut milk, eggs, nutmeg, salt and pepper in a small bowl until well mixed.
Place mushrooms, sun-dried tomatoes and sheep feta cheese on the tart.
Pour coconut and egg mixture over the tart pans.
Place on medium rack and bake for about 35-40 minutes.Photos: Johanna Frenkel
